name: rv-automoviles
description: Sistema de gesti√≥n digital para automotora - RV Automoviles

scripts.install-all: cd api && npm install && npm run prisma:generate && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:vercel: cd api && npm install && npm run prisma:generate && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:vercel: cd api && npm run prisma:migrate:deploy && cd ../frontend && npm run vercel-build
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.db:setup: cd api && npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
